QueryDefinition.Query:
With ch AS( select person_id from {sc}._chunks where ChunkId = {0}
) SELECT a.eventdate, a.patid, a.staffid, concat(a.patid,to_char(a.eventdate,'YYYYMMDD'), coalesce(con.constype, 99))::numeric as visit_occurrence_id, MOD(a.patid, 100000) as care_site_id, m.read_code, case when con.constype = 0 then 'Data Not Entered' when con.constype = 1 then 'Clinic' when con.constype = 2 then 'Night visit, Deputising service' when con.constype = 3 then 'Follow-up/routine visit' when con.constype = 4 then 'Night visit, Local rota' when con.constype = 5 then 'Mail from patient' when con.constype = 6 then 'Night visit , practice' when con.constype = 7 then 'Out of hours, Practice' when con.constype = 8 then 'Out of hours, Non Practice' when con.constype = 9 then 'Surgery consultation' when con.constype = 10 then 'Telephone call from a patient' when con.constype = 11 then 'Acute visit' when con.constype = 12 then 'Discharge details' when con.constype = 13 then 'Letter from Outpatients' when con.constype = 14 then 'Repeat Issue' when con.constype = 15 then 'Other' when con.constype = 16 then 'Results recording' when con.constype = 17 then 'Mail to patient' when con.constype = 18 then 'Emergency Consultation' when con.constype = 19 then 'Administration' when con.constype = 20 then 'Casualty Attendance' when con.constype = 21 then 'Telephone call to a patient' when con.constype = 22 then 'Third Party Consultation' when con.constype = 23 then 'Hospital Admission' when con.constype = 24 then 'Children''s Home Visit' when con.constype = 25 then 'Day Case Report' when con.constype = 26 then 'GOS18 Report' when con.constype = 27 then 'Home Visit' when con.constype = 28 then 'Hotel Visit' when con.constype = 29 then 'NHS Direct Report' when con.constype = 30 then 'Nursing Home Visit' when con.constype = 31 then 'Residential Home Visit' when con.constype = 32 then 'Twilight Visit' when con.constype = 33 then 'Triage' when con.constype = 34 then 'Walk-in Centre' when con.constype = 35 then 'Co-op Telephone advice' when con.constype = 36 then 'Co-op Surgery Consultation' when con.constype = 37 then 'Co-op Home Visit' when con.constype = 38 then 'Minor Injury Service' when con.constype = 39 then 'Medicine Management' when con.constype = 40 then 'Community Clinic' when con.constype = 41 then 'Community Nursing Note' when con.constype = 42 then 'Community Nursing Report' when con.constype = 43 then 'Data Transferred from other system' when con.constype = 44 then 'Health Authority Entry' when con.constype = 45 then 'Health Visitor Note' when con.constype = 46 then 'Health Visitor Report' when con.constype = 47 then 'Hospital Inpatient Report' when con.constype = 48 then 'Initial Post Discharge Review' when con.constype = 49 then 'Laboratory Request' when con.constype = 50 then 'Night Visit' when con.constype = 51 then 'Radiology Request' when con.constype = 52 then 'Radiology Result' when con.constype = 53 then 'Referral Letter' when con.constype = 54 then 'Social Services Report' when con.constype = 55 then 'Telephone Consultation' when con.constype = 56 then 'Template Entry' when con.constype = 57 then 'GP to GP communication transaction' when con.constype = 58 then 'Non-consultation medication data' when con.constype = 59 then 'Non-consultation data' when con.constype = 60 then 'ePharmacy message' when con.constype = 61 then 'Extended Hours' end as description, con.constype from ch join {sc}.Referral a on a.patid = ch.person_id join {sc}.consultation con on a.patid = con.patid and a.consid = con.consid left join {sc}.Medical m on (a.medcode = m.medcode) order by a.patid
